code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DeleteUser=()=>{const[id,setId]=useState('');const handleDelete=async()=>{const response=await axios.delete("http://localhost:8080/api/users/".concat(id));console.log(response.data);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Delete User"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:id,onChange:e=>setId(e.target.value),placeholder:"User ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleDelete,children:"Delete"})]});};export default DeleteUser;
